servinfo.title: DTC B1074 / B1078: Driver / Passenger Forward-Sensor Circuit Short to Power Circuit or Open

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to DTC B1073 / B1077: Driver / Passenger Forward-Sensor Circuit Short to Ground .

attention2.ptxt: Be sure to observe instructions under CAUTION in “Air Bag Diagnostic System Check Flow”.

servinfosub.title: DTC Will Set when
servinfosub.ptxt: Forward-sensor abnormal signal is detected by SDM.

ptxt.emph: Step 1: Check for open circuit in forward-sensor circuit.
Step 2: Check for short circuit between forward-sensor circuit and power supply circuit.
Step 3: Check if malfunction is in forward-sensor.

test1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Check proper connection to SDM connector at terminals “G47-9” and “G47-17” or “L33-9” and “L33-10” (for DTC B1074), or terminals “G47-11” and “G47-19” or “L33-11” and “L33-12” (for DTC B1078).
Check proper connection to forward-sensor connector at terminals “E13-1” and “E13-2” or “E24-1” and “E24-2”.
Using service wire (1), connect “E13-1” and “E13-2” terminal (for DTC B1074) or “E24-1” and “E24-2” terminal (for DTC B1078) of forward-sensor connector.

Measure resistance between “G47-9” and “G47-17” (for DTC B1074) or “G47-11” and “G47-19” (for DTC B1078) [A], or between “L33-9” and “L33-10” (for DTC B1074) or “L33-11” and “L33-12” (for DTC B1078) [B].

testgroup.question: Is each measured resistance 1 Ω or less?

paragroup.ptxt: For DTC B1074: High resistance or open wire in “ORN” circuit or “PNK/BLK” circuit.
For DTC B1078: High resistance or open wire in “PNK” circuit or “PNK/BLU” circuit.

test1.ptxt: Disconnect service wire from “E13” or “E24” connector.

Measure voltage between “G47-9” and body ground, “G47-17” and body ground (for DTC B1074) or “G47-11” and body ground, “G47-19” and body ground (for DTC B1078) [A], or between “L33-9” and body ground, “L33-10” and body ground (for DTC B1074) or “L33-11” and body ground, “L33-12” and body ground (for DTC B1078) [B].

testgroup.question: With ignition switch ON, is each measured value 1 V or less?

paragroup.ptxt: For DTC B1074: “ORN” circuit or “PNK/BLK” circuit shorted to power circuit.
For DTC B1078: “PNK” circuit or “PNK/BLU” circuit shorted to power circuit.

test1.ptxt: Check forward-sensor referring to Forward-Sensor Inspection .

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good SDM and recheck.
Replace forward-sensor referring to Forward-Sensor Removal and Installation . If DTC still exists, substitute a known-good SDM and recheck.

attention3.ptxt: Upon completion of inspection and repair work, perform the following items.

item.ptxt: Reconnect all air bag system components and ensure all components are properly mounted.
Clear DTCs referring to DTC Clearance , if any.
Repeat Air Bag Diagnostic System Check to confirm that the trouble has been corrected.
